data.prayer: Spirit, help the 28,435 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,556,565 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bid, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Bid that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 28,435 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 2,585,000 people living in Bid, Maharashtra, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Holar people.
Spirit, guide seekers in Bid, Maharashtra, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 28,435 believers in Bid to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Bid.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
